texts.LongWelcomeMessage: Welcome to the application. This is a startup project based on the ABP framework. For more information, visit abp.io.
texts.DealCategoryDeletionConfirmationMessage: Are you sure to delete the dealCategory {0}?
texts.DealDescriptionPlaceholder: Trình bày sản phẩm hoặc ưu đãi bằng lời của bạn, giải thích mức độ thú vị của ưu đãi theo ý kiến ​​của bạn, mô tả cách nhận giá nếu có mánh khóe ... Không sao chép và dán nội dung từ các trang khác! Có phải thỏa thuận của bạn trong cửa hàng? Đừng quên ghi rõ thành phố nơi nó nằm và số hàng có sẵn!
texts.DealDeletionConfirmationMessage: Are you sure to delete the deal {0}?
texts.DealLinkNotice: Vui lòng cung cấp liên kết đến trang nơi cộng đồng có thể lấy thông tin, xem sản phẩm và tận hưởng ưu đãi!
texts.UseAnotherServiceToLogin: Use another service to log in
texts.UserLockedOutMessage: The user account has been locked out due to invalid login attempts. Please wait a while and try again.
texts.LoginIsNotAllowed: You are not allowed to login! Your account is inactive or needs to confirm your email/phone number.
texts.SelfRegistrationDisabledMessage: Self-registration is disabled for this application. Please contact the application administrator to register a new user.
texts.LocalLoginDisabledMessage: Local login is disabled for this application.
texts.ThereAreNoLoginSchemesConfiguredForThisC: There are no login schemes configured for this client.
texts.PasswordChangedMessage: Your password has been changed successfully.
texts.DisplayName:Name: Name
texts.Description:Abp.Account.IsSelfRegistrati: Whether a user can register the account by him or herself.
texts.Description:Abp.Account.EnableLocalLogin: Indicates if the server will allow users to authenticate with a local account.
texts.LoggedOutText: You have been signed out and you will be redirected soon.
texts.ReturnToText: Click here to return to the application
texts.SendPasswordResetLink_Information: A password reset link will be sent to your email to reset your password. If you don't get an email within a few minutes, please re-try.
texts.PasswordResetMailSentMessage: Account recovery email sent to your e-mail address. If you don't see this email in your inbox within 15 minutes, look for it in your junk mail folder. If you find it there, please mark it as -Not Junk-.
texts.Volo.Account:InvalidEmailAddress: Can not find the given email address: {0}
texts.PasswordResetInfoInEmail: We received an account recovery request! If you initiated this request, click the following link to reset your password.
texts.AccessDeniedMessage: You do not have access to this resource.
